description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a subset of AI that enables machines to understand and generate human language.

generated_text:
**Module 15: NLP**
**Duration: 34 minutes**
**Level: Advanced**

Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a subset of AI that enables machines to understand and generate human language. Key concepts include tokenization, sentiment analysis, and named entity recognition. Advanced learners will explore deep learning techniques, such as recurrent neural networks (RNNs) and transformers, to improve NLP models. Practical applications include text classification, language translation, and chatbots. By completing this module, you will be able to design and implement effective NLP solutions, leveraging AI to extract insights from unstructured data and drive business value.
